title: Indigenous 4G, 5G tech to be deployed in BSNL network by August 15: C-DoT official - Economic Times
content: Indigenous 4G, 5G tech to be deployed in BSNL network by August 15: C-DoT official  Economic Times
description: BSNL has been conducting trials for 4G networks with a TCS-led consortium which includes C-DoT as a technology partner.
